trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_SEQ_00<tab>Hayase is scrutinizing the area.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_TODO_00<tab>Patrol the area for suspicious activity.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_TODO_01<tab>Report to Hayase.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_000<tab>You there! Show me your─ah...never mind. You appear strong but do not look vicious enough to commit such an atrocious crime.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_001<tab><sigh> You see, the other day we found the dead body of one of our comrades.

TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_002<tab>He died of a knife wound to the back and through the chest. Poor bastard. No one turns their back on an enemy, so more likely than not, he was killed by a friend.

TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_003<tab>We need to prevent any further casualties, and I ask that you assist us. Please patrol the more secluded areas of our island and save anyone who looks like they might be in danger.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_005<tab>Please patrol the island for any suspicious activity and save anyone who appears to be in harm's way.

TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_PATROL02683_000_010<tab>Hayase requested that you survey the island for suspicious activity? I can't say I have noticed anything out of the ordinary, but I will definitely keep my eyes peeled. Thanks for the warning.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_PATROL02683_000_019<tab>I have not noticed anything unusual but I will keep my eyes and ears peeled.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_SHELLFISH02683_000_020<tab>You are looking for a murderer? Ah, well, I am looking for clams. Good for you and sadly for me, I have spotted neither.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_SHELLFISH02683_000_029<tab>Nope, no murderers...<sigh>...and most definitely no clams around here.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_TRAINING02683_000_030<tab>Nothing suspicious here, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Now, if there is nothing else, I really must return to training!
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_TRAINING02683_000_039<tab>My apologies, but you are breaking my concentration. If there is nothing else of import, please allow me to carry on with my training.

TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_WOUNDED02683_000_050<tab>Thank the kami you arrived when you did. You saved my life. <sigh> I was tricked into coming here by a man who claimed to be a fisherman. He said he had a job opportunity for me, but I should have known better.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_WOUNDED02683_000_051<tab>I must return and have my wounds looked at. You best leave this place, too. There might be others lurking about in the shadows.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_060<tab>Ah, you have returned. Thank you for surveying the island and saving one of our comrades from certain death.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_061<tab>We did a bit of investigating and discovered that the alleged fisherman's victims have one thing in common.

TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_062<tab>The two of them once stopped a ship full of ronin seeking passage through the Ruby Sea. Upon demanding that they pay the Ruby Tithe, the nomad samurai drew their swords and all hells broke loose. A great deal of blood was shed that day.
TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_063<tab>By the sound of it, these men had come to avenge the deaths of their compatriots. It doesn't surprise me. Most ronin are no better than your average criminal.

TEXT_STMBDZ211_02683_HAYASE_000_064<tab>Sadly, this incident cost us a good man. Thanks to you, however, we were able to prevent any more casualties. Please accept this gift as a token of our appreciation.
